comments:
Description:
Insert a URI image, the format is like: ..\..\Desktop\sail_san_diego.jpg 
In the "Edit Image Item" dialog and layout, previw result is ok. But in the preview page of layout, evaluation error pops up. But the image is displayed correctly in the preview page as well.

Error message:
The following items have errors: 


Image (id = 93): 
- There are errors evaluating script "..\..\Desktop\sail_san_diego.jpg". 
Error.ScriptEvaluationError ( 1 time(s) )
detail : org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.EngineException: There are errors evaluating script "..\..\Desktop\sail_san_diego.jpg". at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.ExecutionContext.evaluate(ExecutionContext.java:574) at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.ExecutionContext.evaluate(ExecutionContext.java:536) at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.ReportItemExecutor.evaluate(ReportItemExecutor.java:221) at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.ImageItemExecutor.handleURIImage(ImageItemExecutor.java:191) at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.ImageItemExecutor.handleImage(ImageItemExecutor.java:144) at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.ImageItemExecutor.execute(ImageItemExecutor.java:108) at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.internal.executor.l18n.LocalizedReportItemExecutor.execute(LocalizedReportItemExecutor.java:35) at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.layout.html.HTMLPageLM.layoutChildren(HTMLPageLM.java:123) at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.layout.html.HTMLPageLM.layout(HTMLPageLM.java:81) at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.layout.html.HTMLReportLayoutEngine.layout(HTMLReportLayoutEngine.java:80) at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.impl.RunAndRenderTask.run(RunAndRenderTask.java:188) at org.eclipse.birt.report.service.ReportEngineService.runAndRenderReport(Unknown Source) at org.eclipse.birt.report.service.ReportEngineService.runAndRenderReport(Unknown Source) at org.eclipse.birt.report.service.BirtViewerReportService.runAndRenderReport(Unknown Source) at org.eclipse.birt.report.service.actionhandler.BirtRunAndRenderActionHandler.__execute(Unknown Source) at

In the edit image dialog, if edit with: "..\\..\\Desktop\\sail_san_diego.jpg", error pops up when click preview button. We should provide one way which works in image builder, report layout and preview output.

It  will be more user friendly that user only need to enter
"..\..\Desktop\sail_san_diego.jpg"  instead of 
"..\\..\\Desktop\\sail_san_diego.jpg"
Is this engine or designer issue?

It is the user's fault. the user input an URI as text instead of the constant string in javascript.

If we have syntax checking in the expression builder that will be helpful althugh it won't avoid those kind of errors.

Still suggest to close it or submit a new SCR for syntax checking in expression builder.

Only input:"../../Desktop/Peaks.jpg"
could be worked both in image builder and preview output.
It works. This scr complains that the output contains a script error tells the user that the expression contains errors.

1.Input:"..\..\Desktop\Peaks.jpg" or "../../Desktop/Peaks.jpg", it works both in image builder and preview output.
2.Input:"..\\..\\Desktop\\Peaks.jpg", error pops up when preview the image in the image builder. The error is:The image cannot be loaded, file not found. But in the preview output, it works.
3.Input:"..//..//Desktop//Peaks.jpg", it could not work both in image builder and preview output.
SInce input:"..\..\Desktop\Peaks.jpg" or "../../Desktop/Peaks.jpg" works both in image builder and preview output, it works as designed.
The format as "..\..\Desktop\a.jpg" does not always work well. It can't work well in 200609181353 build.
